heading: HR00762
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON HEALTH, YOUTH AND SPORTS AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED INCREASING CASES OF DEPRESSION AND MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES AMONG MINORS AND YOUTH IN THE COUNTRY WITH THE INTENTION OF SUBMITTING LEGISLATIVE APPROACHES TO CURB THIS ALARMING SOCIAL CONCERN AND TO PROMOTE THE WELL-BEING AND WELFARE OF YOUNG FILIPINOS

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00762
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON HEALTH, YOUTH AND SPORTS AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED INCREASING CASES OF DEPRESSION AND MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES AMONG MINORS AND YOUTH IN THE COUNTRY WITH THE INTENTION OF SUBMITTING LEGISLATIVE APPROACHES TO CURB THIS ALARMING SOCIAL CONCERN AND TO PROMOTE THE WELL-BEING AND WELFARE OF YOUNG FILIPINOS
